tool.name: RTEvaluation
tool.description: Application that evaluates TPs (true positives), TNs, FPs, and FNs for an idXML file with predicted RTs.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && #if $sequences_file: mkdir sequences_file && ln -s '$sequences_file' 'sequences_file/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $sequences_file.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($sequences_file.ext)' && #end if mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' #if $sequences_file: -sequences_file 'sequences_file/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $sequences_file.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($sequences_file.ext)' #end if -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("tabular")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("tabular")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Indicates whether the output file format of the table should be LaTeX or TSV (default)
Significance level of first dimension RT filte
Significance level of second dimension RT filte
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Application that evaluates TPs (true positives), TNs, FPs, and FNs for an idXML file with predicted RTs.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.8.0/html/UTILS_RTEvaluation.html
